alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dust Advisory issued May 30 at 5:29PM PDT until May 30 at 6:30PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Western Churchill County in west central Nevada... * Until 630 PM PDT. * At 526 PM PDT, a dust plume was 7 miles northwest of Fallon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. This plume will affect US-50 from Hazen through Sand Mountain and US- 95 south of Trinity Junction to 15 miles south of Fallon. Locations impacted include... Fallon, Stillwater, Fallon Municipal Airport, Junction U.S 50 And NV 116 (Stuart Rd), Junction U.S 95 And NV 120 (Pasture Rd), Battleground Point, Junction U.S 50 And NV 117 (sheckler Cutoff) and Fallon Station. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust can be hazardous. Delay or reroute travel. Remain aware of the weather.
